verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD בַּצָּרָ֣תָה <S%H6869><s%> batz-tza-Ra-tah In my distress לִּ֑י Li; קָ֝רָ֗אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti, I cried וַֽיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> Vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni. and he heard

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD הַצִּ֣ילָה <S%H5337><s%> hatz-Tzi-lah Deliver נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi my soul מִשְּׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> mis-se-fat- lips שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker; from lying מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> mil-la-Shon tongue רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> re-mi-Yah. [and] from a deceitful

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What יִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten What shall be given לְ֭ךָ Le-cha וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- and what יֹּסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif unto thee;or what shall be done לָ֗ךְ Lach, לָשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> la-Shon babbler רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> re-mi-Yah. unto thee thou false

חִצֵּ֣י <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzei arrows גִבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor of the mighty שְׁנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8150><s%> she-nu-Nim; Sharp עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> 'Im, With גַּחֲלֵ֥י <S%H1513><s%> ga-cha-Lei with coals רְתָמִֽים׃ <S%H7574><s%> re-ta-Mim. of juniper

אֽוֹיָה־ <S%H190><s%> o-yah- Woe לִ֭י li כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גַ֣רְתִּי <S%H1481><s%> Gar-ti is me that I sojourn מֶ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> Me-shech; in Mesech שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי <S%H7931><s%> Chan-ti, [that] I dwell עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- among אָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> 'o-ho-Lei in the tents קֵדָֽר׃ <S%H6938><s%> ke-Dar. of Kedar

רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> Rab-bat hath long שָֽׁכְנָה־ <S%H7931><s%> sha-che-nah- dwelt לָּ֣הּ lah נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; My soul עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> 'Im, who שׂוֹנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne with him that hateth שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. peace

אֲ‍ ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> 'ani-Sha- I am שָׁ֭לוֹם <S%H7965><s%> lom I [am for] peace וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-Ber; but when I speak הֵ֝֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, are for לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah. they [are] for war
